lines.i: Information on whether or not the mother had been transferred to the delivery facility from another facility based on maternal medical or fetal indications.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.35"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:420)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:422)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:421)/@code="73763-5" Mother was transferred for maternal medical or fetal indications for delivery (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:527)
A code value that indicates the nature of the observation - it refers to the transfer of the mother to the facility prior to delivery.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:423)
A Boolean value to indicate whether or not the mother was transferred to the facility prior to delivery.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] participant (CONF:424)
Record the source of transfer if the mother has been transferred from another facility. If the name of the facility is not known, enter "unknown."
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="ORG" (CONF:425)
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole (CONF:426)
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="SDLOC" (CONF:427)
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] scopingEntity (CONF:428)
This scopingEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ORG" (CONF:429)
This scopingEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @determinerCode="INSTANCE" (CONF:430)
This scopingEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name (CONF:431)
The name of the facility the mother was transferred from.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:420)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:422)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:421)/@code="73763-5" Mother was transferred for maternal medical or fetal indications for delivery (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:527)
A code value that indicates the nature of the observation - it refers to the transfer of the mother to the facility prior to delivery.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:423)
A Boolean value to indicate whether or not the mother was transferred to the facility prior to delivery.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] participant (CONF:424)
Record the source of transfer if the mother has been transferred from another facility. If the name of the facility is not known, enter "unknown."
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="ORG" (CONF:425)
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole (CONF:426)
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="SDLOC" (CONF:427)
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] scopingEntity (CONF:428)
This scopingEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ORG" (CONF:429)
This scopingEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @determinerCode="INSTANCE" (CONF:430)
This scopingEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name (CONF:431)
The name of the facility the mother was transferred from.
